name: (R) Resist. FS (NG), Manage-Low
_description: Switch from gas furnace/WH/drying/cooking to resistance heating/WH/drying/cooking w/ panel management

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Based on EIA ER furnace heating data (p. 23).  Other end uses represent typical resistance-based performance for category, relative to typical gas where applicable.

installed_cost_source.notes: based on EIA ER furnace heating data (p. 23); avoids panel upgrade cost, add management cost of $475 from Sean

product_lifetime_source.notes: based on EIA ER furnace heating data (p. 23)

market_scaling_fractions_source.notes: Cooling multiple of 49% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a cooling system (16,171 homes) where there is heating via natural gas other than steam/hot water (7,845 homes).
